sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) ||'[' || T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE || ']' PRT_AT_CODE_NM2 ,NVL2(T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC||' '|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM ||'-'|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ||' '|| T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) AS GIS_ASSETS_LNMS ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_LNM ,T1.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN
,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,TO_CHAR(T3.USAGE_PD_FROM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T3.USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,NVL(T3.USAGE_AR,0) AS USAGE_AR ,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0) - NVL(T3.USAGE_AR,0) AS NO_USAGE_AR ,ROUND((NVL(T3.USAGE_AR,0) / (CASE WHEN T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR IS NULL OR T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR = 0 THEN 1 ELSE T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR END)) * 100,2) AS USAGE_AR_PER FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,MIN(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM) AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,MAX(T2.USAGE_PD_TO) AS USAGE_PD_TO ,SUM(T2.USAGE_AR) AS USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND 'Y'=(SELECT PRMISN_YN FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND MNG_NO=T2.MNG_NO AND MNG_CNT=T2.MNG_CNT) GROUP BY T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD, T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchPrtAtCode#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchFcltyNm# || '%'
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'
ORDER BY T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS DATA_COUNT ,SUM(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) AS SUM_ASSETS_AR ,SUM(T3.USAGE_AR) AS SUM_USAGE_AR FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,MIN(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM) AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,MAX(T2.USAGE_PD_TO) AS USAGE_PD_TO ,SUM(T2.USAGE_AR) AS USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND 'Y'=(SELECT PRMISN_YN FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND MNG_NO=T2.MNG_NO AND MNG_CNT=T2.MNG_CNT) GROUP BY T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD, T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) T3 ON (T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T3.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T3.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE 1=1
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchPrtAtCode#
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #searchFcltyNm# || '%'
AND T1.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #searchLoc# || '%'

SELECT GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T3.ENTRPSCD, '1') AS ENTRPS_NM ,NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0) AS USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(t2.USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO ,T2.USAGE_PURPS ,T2.USAGE_DTLS ,T2.ENTRPS_SE ,T2.EXEMPT_SE ,T2.EXEMPT_RSN ,T2.EXEMPT_RSN_CD ,TO_CHAR(T2.EXEMPT_PD_FROM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXEMPT_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(T2.EXEMPT_PD_TO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXEMPT_PD_TO ,T2.COMPUT_DTLS AS COMPUT_DTLS ,NVL(T2.OLNLP,0) AS OLNLP ,NVL(T2.APPLC_PRICE,0) AS APPLC_PRICE ,NVL(T2.APPLC_TARIFF,0) AS APPLC_TARIFF ,T2.APPLC_MTH ,NVL(T2.RDCXPT_FEE,0) AS RDCXPT_FEE ,NVL(T2.FEE,0) AS FEE ,TO_CHAR(T2.TRMNAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TRMNAT_DT ,T2.TRMNAT_RSN ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD ,T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,ROUND((NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0) / (CASE WHEN T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR IS NULL OR T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR = 0 THEN 1 ELSE T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR END)) * 100,2) AS USAGE_AR_PER FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 ON (T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#searchDtFr#, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#searchDtTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND 'Y'=(SELECT PRMISN_YN FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND MNG_NO=T2.MNG_NO AND MNG_CNT=T2.MNG_CNT)

SELECT GAM_GETENTRPSNM(T3.ENTRPSCD, '1') AS ENTRPS_NM ,NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0) AS USAGE_AR ,TO_CHAR(T2.USAGE_PD_FROM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_FROM ,TO_CHAR(t2.USAGE_PD_TO,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USAGE_PD_TO
,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_AR ,NVL(T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR,0) AS GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR ,ROUND((NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0) / (CASE WHEN T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR IS NULL OR T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR = 0 THEN 1 ELSE T1.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR END)) * 100,2) AS USAGE_AR_PER FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN ASSETS_RENT_F T3 ON (T2.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.MNG_YEAR=T3.MNG_YEAR AND T2.MNG_NO=T3.MNG_NO AND T2.MNG_CNT=T3.MNG_CNT) LEFT OUTER JOIN GIS_ASSETS_CD_F T1 ON (T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=T1.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD=T1.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=T1.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) WHERE T2.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND T2.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#
AND T2.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#usagePdFrom#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T2.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#usagePdTo#, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
AND 'Y'=(SELECT PRMISN_YN FROM ASSETS_RENT_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND MNG_YEAR=T2.MNG_YEAR AND MNG_NO=T2.MNG_NO AND MNG_CNT=T2.MNG_CNT)
